summary: NHTSA RECALL 00-V-311-001 CONCERNING  MIRAGE MODEL VEHICLES EQUIPPED WITH 1.5L ENGINES;  MONTERO SPORT MODELS EQUIPPED WITH 3.0L ENGINES; AND MONTERO MODELS EQUIPPED WITH 3.0L ENGINES.  THE BOLT SECURING THE CRANKSHAFT PULLEY CAN BECOME LOOSE AND THE PULLEY COULD FALL OFF THE VEHICLE.  RECALL REPAIRS FAILED IN THIS VEHICLE.*AK
